"Roberto Totaro" (Belluno,1957) is an italian cartoonist he is famous for the comic "Nirvana",translated also in Spanish and "La Gazzetta della Giungla".
Biography.
Roberto Totaro was born in 1957 in Belluno,in Northen Italy and he studied at Artistic Liceo (High School) and L'accademia di Belle Arti di Venezia (University of Art in Venice). He started his career during the 80's,learning from the Disney author Luciano Gatto,and drawing comics for the italian magazine Topolino (italian for Mickey Mouse).
